instructions:
Instructions

An by this I mean for cooking Fried plantain of course, what else?
ingredients:
Stuff to go into the making

A set of stuff what goes in to make said meal, said meal being Jollof rice and plantain.
about: Fried Plantain can be eaten in a variety of ways. It will often come to the rescue when you need a fast and easy meal. A popular side dish to many of the rice recipes and can be enjoyed by people from all over the world. Low in fat and super delicious.
